item.title: Decomissioning AWS services
item.description: produces this Introduction At the end of May we were tasked with decommisioning resources on the legacy AWS accounts. Not only this but to create a documented and repeatable procedure. After a discussion with the tech lead we decided to use a certain set of buckets to test our procedure. Me and the other apprentice decided to seperate concerns. He would focus on programmatically removing the buckets and I would work on a way of migrating the important data kept within them.
